pandaloyalty.title: PandaLoyalty - Customer Management Website
pandaloyalty.description: The PandaLoyalty system is a customer care platform and loyalty program management solution that helps businesses build and maintain long-term relationships with customers. Through point accumulation and rewards for purchases or other actions, customers can redeem their points for gifts. The system also integrates online payment, shipping, mini-games, and connects with multiple third-party services such as POS, KiotViet, and Zalo Official Account.
pandaloyalty.achievement: Successfully developed and deployed to over 15 customers nationwide

plant.title: Plant Management Website
plant.description: This is a system for monitoring the growth, location, area, and status of plants. After purchasing a product, customers will contribute a tree to help green the country. They will receive a tree code and activate their planted tree through the website. On the website, users can track their tree's growth, location, and images throughout its development. Additionally, they can read news about the company, its activities, and enjoy mini-apps on the platform.

sale.title: Sale Miniapp
sale.description: This is a sales system that allows users to browse products, make purchases through the miniapp, pay directly via VNPay, and view purchase and payment history on the miniapp. The system includes several other features such as a shopping cart, online payment, delivery, price filtering, viewing personal information, product details, etc. The system is integrated with third parties like KiotViet, VNPay, Grab, and others.
